mapper.select: SELECT p.panchayatno AS panchayatNo, p.panchayatname AS panchayatName, p.panchayataddress AS panchayatAddress, p.panchayatmembers AS panchayatMembers FROM Panchayat p
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO panchayat (panchayatNo,panchayatName, panchayatAddress, panchayatMembers) VALUES (#{panchayat.panchayatNo},#{panchayat.panchayatName}, #{panchayat.panchayatAddress}, #{panchayat.panchayatMemberList, typeHandler=com.example.sessionfactory.typehandler.JsonbTypeHandler})
